name: BIOMASS Calibration Targets
description: Known calibration and validation sites for the ESA BIOMASS mission. Coordinates are WGS84 (EPSG:4326).

properties.name: New Norcia BCT
properties.description: Biomass Calibration Transponder (BCT). 5 m phased-array P-band antenna in radome. Primary instrument calibration target for the BIOMASS mission. Built by C-CORE (Canada), antenna by IDS/Fincantieri NexTech.

properties.name: New Norcia DSA-1
properties.description: ESA Deep Space Antenna 1 (35 m). New Norcia ground station complex where the BCT is co-located.

properties.name: Remningstorp Forest
properties.description: Hemi-boreal forest test site (~1200 ha). Used for BioSAR 2007 and BioSAR 2010 airborne campaigns. Two 5 m trihedral corner reflectors deployed by FOI for SAR calibration.

properties.name: Lope National Park
properties.description: Tropical forest validation site. AfriSAR campaign (2015-2016). Forest-savanna mosaic with extensive ground truth biomass measurements.

properties.name: Mondah Forest
properties.description: Coastal tropical forest validation site near Libreville. AfriSAR campaign. Dense tropical forest with lidar and ground-truth data.

properties.name: Mabounie
properties.description: Tropical forest validation site. AfriSAR campaign. Dense equatorial forest with ground-truth biomass inventory.

properties.name: Rabi
properties.description: Tropical forest validation site. AfriSAR campaign. Oil-field adjacent forest with well-characterized biomass plots.
